entries.meaning: (US, Mississippi, dialect) Nelumbo lutea, the American lotus, the water chinkapin.
examples: […]  she was as the wild yoncopin to the calla lily. Marjie knew how to dress. To-day, shaded by the buggy-top, in her dainty light blue lawn, with the soft pink of her cheeks and her clear white brow and throat, she was a most delicious thing  […]
